title: [Health] Study of 4351 young aged 13 to 24 years found that both smoking and vaping is linked to eye issues, and the combo led to the most frequent symptoms than only smoking or vaping

[Health] Poor water quality found to disproportionately affect socially vulnerable communities. Approximately 70% of the population affected ranked in the highest social vulnerability category, with many different social parameters, beyond income, linked to different drinking water quality violations.
